resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105854</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105854</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202560</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Meter Madness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meßinstrument-Verrücktheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Folie de Mètre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Loucura Do Medidor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Follia del tester</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρέλα μετρητών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Locura Del Contador</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The students will identify 2/4, 3/4, and 4/4 time signatures. They will also identify the down-beat and begin to understand conducting patterns.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kursteilnehmer kennzeichnen die 
Unterzeichnungen mit 2/4, 3/4 und 4/4mal. Sie kennzeichnen auch 
unten-schlagen und anfangen, Leitmuster zu verstehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants identifieront des signatures de 
2/4, 3/4, et 4/4 fois. Ils identifieront également vers le 
bas-battent et commencent à comprendre les configurations de 
conduite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes identificarão assinaturas de 2/4, 
3/4, e 4/4 de vez. Identificarão também para baixo-batem e 
começam a compreender testes padrões conduzindo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi identificheranno lle firme di 2/4, 3/4
e 4/4 di volta. Egualmente identificheranno giù-battono e 
cominciano a capire i modelli di condotta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα προσδιορίσουν τις υπογραφές 2/4, 
3/4, και 4/4 χρόνου. Θα προσδιορίσουν επίσης 
κάτω-κτυπούν και αρχίζουν να καταλαβαίνουν τη διεύθυνση των 
προτύπων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes identificarán firmas de 2/4, 3/4,
y 4/4 vez. También identificarán abajo-baten y comienzan a 
entender modelos que conducen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ALICE BARLOWE
FN:ALICE BARLOWE
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202560</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105854</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/meter-madness</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
